### Brady Johnston

-   Currently writing PhD thesis (almost there...) in Structural Biology and Biophysics

-   Part-time data scientist with the Minderoo Foundation

I'm a self-taught coder, first learning R to do data analysis for my PhD and now regularly write Python & Julia code for various projects, and I get paid to write R code for the Minderoo foundation.

I've written multiple R packages, and am currently developing a suite of tools for protein visualisation inside of the 3D animation package Blender. You can see more about my different software projects [on my github](https://github.com/bradyajohnston) and I post about my different data vis experiments on my [twitter](https://twitter.com/bradyajohnston).
